template.template: Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus
template.name: Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus
template.description: Template Module Generic version: 0.15 MIBs used: SNMPv2-MIB

item.name: Machine Pool Used Status
item.description:
This is a summary of the pool used status. Syntax INTEGER {normal(1), attention(2), warning(3)
KIHAGYTAM: <preprocessing> <step> <type>DISCARD_UNCHANGED_HEARTBEAT</type> <params>1800</params> </step> </preprocessing>

item.name: SNMP traps (fallback)
item.description: Item is used to collect all SNMP traps unmatched by other snmptrap items

item.name: Device contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Device location
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: Device uptime
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item.name: Overall system status
item.description: INTEGER {unknown(1), unused(2), ok(3), warning(4) failed(5) } KIHAGYTAM: <preprocessing> <step> <type>DISCARD_UNCHANGED_HEARTBEAT</type> <params>1800</params> </step> </preprocessing>

item.name: Maximum temperature in the last hour
item.description: The maximum temperature is shown during one hour in the past. kihagytam: <preprocessing> <step> <type>DISCARD_UNCHANGED_HEARTBEAT</type> <params>1800</params> </step> </preprocessing>

item.name: Maximum temperature enclosure in the last hour
item.description:
The maximum temperature is shown during one hour in the past.
kihagytam: <preprocessing> <step> <type>DISCARD_UNCHANGED_HEARTBEAT</type> <params>1800</params> </step> </preprocessing>

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:disk.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].max(15m)}<1 or {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:disk.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].min(15m)}>1) and ({Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:disk.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].max(15m)}<5 or {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:disk.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].min(15m)}>5) and ({Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:disk.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].max(15m)}<65 or {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:disk.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].min(15m)}>65)
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Disk №{#SNMPINDEX} not ok

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:raid.group.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].max(15)}<2 or {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:raid.group.status.[{#SNMPINDEX}].min(15)}>2
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> RAID №{#RAID_GROUP} is not ok

trigger.name: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:icmpping.max(#3)}=0

trigger.expression: {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:unit.status.max(15m)}<3 or {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:unit.status.min(15m)}>3
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Storage status is not OK

trigger.expression: {Template Module Generic SNMPv2 to Fuji Eternus:unit.temperature.min(15m)}>50
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Temperature too high
{HOST.NAME} has been restarted
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The device uptime is less than 10 minutes
